'Creator:Kenny 'Name:bcs_InstallPackage_AO-09011 'Type: VB 'Event: Install AML 'Comments:v0.1 Developed By Kenny @Broadway
Dim plmIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") Dim PermissionWasSet As Boolean = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(plmIdentity) Dim LasInnovator As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim LstrPackage As String = Me.getProperty("package", "") Dim strItemType As String = Me.getProperty("itemtype", "") '"Part" Dim strClassifications As String = Me.getProperty("classifications", "") '"Phantom,MBOM only Part" Dim LbwGeneric As bwInnovatorCore.CInnovator.bwGeneric = Nothing Dim LoCommon As bwInnovatorCore.CGeneric.Common = Nothing Dim LoPartItem As Aras.IOM.Item Dim arryClassification() As String Dim LoXML As XmlDocument = Nothing Dim LoConfigNode As XmlNode Dim LoNode As XmlNode Dim i As Integer
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Try If "tw.com.broadway.AO-09011" <> Me.getProperty("package", "") Or strClassifications = "" Or strItemType <> "Part" Then return Me
LbwGeneric =New bwInnovatorCore.CInnovator.bwGeneric LbwGeneric.bwIOMInnovator=LasInnovator LoCommon =New bwInnovatorCore.CGeneric.Common LoConfigNode = LbwGeneric.GetClassStructureByItemType(strItemType) If LoConfigNode Is Nothing Then return Me LoConfigNode = LoCommon.RetrieveXmlNodeByXmlFile(LoXML, LoConfigNode.OuterXml)
arryClassification = strClassifications.Split(CType(",", Char)) For i = 0 To arryClassification.Length - 1 If arryClassification(i) <> "" Then LoNode = LoConfigNode.SelectSingleNode("class[@name='" & arryClassification(i) & "']") If LoNode Is Nothing Then LoNode = LoCommon.AddElement(LoXML, LoConfigNode, "class", "") LoCommon.SetXMLAttribute(LoNode, "name", arryClassification(i)) LoCommon.SetXMLAttribute(LoNode, "id", LoCommon.GetGUID.ToUpper.Replace("-", "")) End If End If Next
LoPartItem = LasInnovator.getItemByKeyedName("ItemType", strItemType) LbwGeneric.UpdateObjectAttribute(LoPartItem.getType, LoPartItem.getID, "class_structure", LoConfigNode.OuterXml, True, True) Return LoPartItem
Catch ex As Exception 'Throw New Exception(ex.Message) Finally If Not LbwGeneric Is NOthing Then LbwGeneric.Dispose() If (PermissionWasSet=True) Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(plmIdentity) End If End Try Return LoPartItem
